title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, goals, and requirements through stakeholder interviews and research on genomic data analysis techniques.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components for data ingestion, processing, analysis, visualization, and data management. Consider scalability, performance, security, and maintainability aspects. Include a detailed breakdown of each component and their interactions, and suggest appropriate technologies for each part.

title: Data Pipeline Design
description: Design the data pipeline for ingesting and processing genomic data from various sources.

title: Analysis Algorithm Development
description: Develop AI algorithms for analyzing genomic data and identifying potential genetic markers for diseases and drug responses.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement the database schema for storing genomic data and analysis results.

title: User Interface Design for BioInformaticsGenomeAnalyzer
description: Design a user-friendly interface for visualizing and interacting with genomic data and analysis results. The design should prioritize ease of use, scalability, and integration with the system architecture.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Implement security measures and ensure compliance with relevant regulations for handling sensitive genomic data.

title: Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Set up a CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deployment of the application.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop comprehensive test plans and perform thorough testing of the application, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests.

title: Documentation and User Training
description: Create comprehensive documentation and develop training materials for end-users and administrators.
